module.name: document_assignment
module.purpose: The Document assignment application module supports the requirement to assign documents to product data. The application module also supports the requirement to assign part or sections of documents to product data.

inscope.li: Assignment of parts or sections of documents to objects.

description.p: The Document_Assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of assigning documents to objects. The UoF also specified the definitional information for assigning parts or sections of documents to objects.

ae.alt: #1: If document assignment is not a partial document assignment. #2: If document assignment is also a partial document assignment.
